description: The government hopes the move to create more outdoor areas will boost bars and restaurants.
title: Traffic ban to 'boost trade' for Douglas quayside pubs and restaurants
title_page: Traffic ban to 'boost trade' for Douglas quayside pubs and restaurants - BBC News
maintext: Part of North Quay in Douglas will be made traffic-free in the evenings so pubs and restaurants can serve more customers outside, the government said.
